Throughout this game, I've built genuine connections while staying true to my values. I've been consistent, transparent, and strategic without betraying allies unnecessarily. 

P5 has played well, but their strategy has involved more manipulation and shifting alliances. I've tried to balance competition with compassion, making tough decisions while respecting everyone's dignity.
